tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thank you, Dr. Anitha, for your exceptional guidance and support throughout my wife‚Äôs pregnancy. We consulted some hospitals and were uncertain about where to continue our care. However, once we visited you, we were confident in our decision to stay with you.

Throughout the nine months of her pregnancy, you ensured the safety my wife under your careful observation. On July 22, 2024, we were blessed with a baby boy. Your constant support and availability made our journey sweet and memorable.

Words cannot fully express our gratitude, but I highly recommend Dr. Anitha for anyone seeking care during their pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Thank you Dr. Anitha for your guidance and support throughout my wife's pregnancy. We had consulted multiple hospitals and was uncertain which hospital to stay with for the complete pregnancy. Once we visited you, I was super happy and glad that we decided to continue with you. Throughout the 9 months of her pregnancy, thank you for keeping my wife and baby safe under your observation. On 10th July'24, we were blessed with a baby boy. Your constant support and continuous availability has made our whole journey sweet and memorable. Words cannot explain our feelings, but I would recommend people to choose you for their pregnancy as well. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π

context: Tubectomy/Tubal Ligation,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review: I recently visited anitha maam for my mtp issues, first thing which i liked in her is her friendly nature, where she matches our mental vibe, where other doctors treated us like as if we did some wrong with mtp, but she explained us nicely n proceeded with procedure, where she helped us a lot, she literally spoke with us as a friend,explianed to us with procedures how she did , so that I shouldn‚Äôt feel something happened inside me. With in 5 days i came out pain n started feeling normal the way she showed n explained. I am really happy with these kind doctor where zero egos n she is very down to earth.i would recommend all women where their precious journey will easy to choose anitha maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We love the way doctor treats her patients. She is very calm and friendly. Because she knows Malayalam we felt very comfortable talking with her. We are very satisfied with her decisions and suggestions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would like to thank Dr Anitha for the excellent care she provided me the past nine months.  Had undergone two miscarriages before meeting her and was anxious about the current pregnancy. But She assured me and gave me confidence each time I visit her.. She was more concerned and kind towards the patient...and now we are blessed with a healthy baby girl on 5th June...Thanks so much for everything.

tags: None
review: The services that I receive from Dr anitha is excellent, did a great job with my mom's operation of uterus  removal which was affected from multiple fibroids and  she was suffering from severe pain when we recharged out her . She explained everything to me in a very clear manner and  was also kind and friendly, She is a wonderful surgeon, and the staff of the SS Sparsh was always helpful and kind. Dr Anitha N ensured we had a smooth procedure, surgery, and follow-up. I am so glad I chose Dr Anitha N and would highly recommend to anyone.

tags: None
review:
Patient name - Chaithra G
Expressing my utmost gratitude for the care and guidance provided by Dr. ANITA N at RR Nagar Sparsh Hospital. My wife was diagnosed with significant fibroids, leading us to seek consultations from various doctors across different hospitals. However, it was Dr. Anita N who stood out by offering a detailed insight into the surgical procedure and care required for my wife‚Äôs speedy recovery. Her explanations regarding the surgical process and the surgery she has done to my wife with utmost care were truly remarkable which eased our concerns during this challenging time.

I recommend Dr. Anita N to those who are facing pregnancy-related complications. Her compassionate care in a city like Bangalore is a rare and valuable find.

tags: None
review:
I am Nalini 43  years old with Fibroid issue making worse everyday. the specialists I went Dr. Anita and her team  for all the attention and explain everything  in detail and simplified way. The security and confidence that they gave me was what made me have the operation. 
After almost a month of surgery the care received careful and considerate at all times, and her team, always so attentive and available and I am immensely grateful for her responsibility and professionalism.
I thank Dr. Anita and her medical for all the attention, patience and trust they gave me, I have no doubt an excellent medical professional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I liked Dr anitha mam in her approach towards the patient,the way she explains things,the way she took care of me,,i feel very much homely near her we don't feel tense near her,she listens to all our problems with very much patient,thank you mamüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i strongly recommend Dr. Anitha N, Gyno, for anyone like to consult a Gynecologist in sparsh,rr nagar. she s very friendly and well experienced.. i had my delivery here. from the beginning she guided me with good care. helped me to deliver a healthy baby. overall i had very good experience with her. thanku sparsh and Dr. Anitha N
